section.name: Service Element
section.p: The net.dpml.meta.info.ServiceDefinition class describes a type of service. It supplements the classic Java interface with a version identifier and attributes. A ServiceDefinition may be referenced by multiple components that will typically supplement the definition in terms of supplied attributes.

subsection.name: XML
subsection.source:
<!-- Example of a service definition. -->
<service>
<!-- Declaration of service version. -->
<version>3.2</version>
<attributes>
<!-- Attribute declarations included in a service definition are independent of a particular service implementation. -->
<attribute key="a-key" value="a-value"/>
</attributes>
</service>
